title: (x) Panic At The Disco ornate caps - Extra Ornamental (Tuscan Floral) {Chris Masters (self), Mike F}
content:
Hi, does anyone know the name of this typeface used for panic! at the disco?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172838im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/top_3562.gif)

many thanks.

 [‹ (x) Erna - Beatnik {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172838/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19522 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) ITS Images That Suit logo - Palatino {Manlio} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172838/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19519 "Go to next forum topic")
author: scallywag

comments.content: I bet it was scanned from a Dover book.
Nasty by [Eduardo Recife](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172838/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/v3/fonts.php) is similar but has a very worn look

thank you so much manlio.

there was a link from yours to the original font that it was a remix of.

in case it’s of interest to anyone the typeface is called extra ornamental  
 [http://www.houseoflime.com/fonts/extraornamental.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172838/http:/www.houseoflime.com/fonts/extraornamental.htm "http://www.houseoflime.com/fonts/extraornamental.htm")

thanks again everyone for your help.
